# Announcements

## Plotathon

![](img/PAT24%20L&L%20Tools%20Workshop.png){fig-align="center"}

## Math Senior Seminar

![](img/Bayesian%20Mixed%20Effects%20Models%20and%20Cats%20Analysis%20of%20Evolutionary%20Biological%20Data%20(1)%20(1).png){fig-align="center"}

# Quantifying Error in Models

## Word Model

$$
Y = Model + Error
$$

## Model Mean

$$
Y = Mean + Error
$$

## Model Median

$$
Y = Median + Error
$$

## Model Mode

$$
Y = Mode + Error
$$

## Quantifying Error

$$
Error = Y - Model
$$

## Quantifying Total Error

1, 2, 2, 3, 3, 3

::: fragment
Mean: 2.33

Median: 2.5

Mode: 3
:::

## Errors

Mean: -1.33, -.33, -.33, .67, .67, .67

Median: -1.5, -.5, -.5., .5, .5. .5

Mode: -2, -1, -1, 0, 0, 0

## Add all errors together

$$
\sum^6_{i-1}Y_i -\mathrm{model}
$$

::: fragment
Mean: $0.02 \approx 0$

Median: -1

Mode: -4
:::

## Absolute Value of error

$$
\sum^6_{i-1}|Y_i -\mathrm{model}|
$$

::: fragment
Mean: 4

Median: 4

Mode: 4
:::

## Sum of Squares

$$
\sum^6_{i-1}(Y_i -\mathrm{model})^2
$$

::: fragment
Mean: 3.3334

Median: 3.5

Mode: 6
:::

## Why Mean


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](8a_files/figure-revealjs/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=960}
:::
:::


## Why Mean


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](8a_files/figure-revealjs/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=960}
:::
:::


## Why Mean


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pna |> with(mean(flipper_length_mm))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 200.967
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](8a_files/figure-revealjs/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=960}
:::
:::


## Why Not Others?


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](8a_files/figure-revealjs/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=960}
:::
:::

include-after-body:
<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    // dispatch for htmlwidgets
    function fireSlideEnter() {
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {
      fireSlideEnter();

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
